definition: to work with one's hands/manual work/workmanship

to do/to make/to produce/to write/to compose/to act as/to engage in/to hold (a party)/to be/to become/to function (in some capacity)/to serve as/to be used for/to form (a bond or relationship)/to pretend/to feign/to act a part/to put on appearance
to do one's work/to work on sb/to try to persuade sb

sentences.english: As a boy, he used to work in a small shop.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候在一家小铺里做工。
这是一件做工非常考究的衣服。

sentences.english: The works of these watches are all home-produced and wear well.
sentences.chinese: 这些手表的做工是国产的并且很耐用。

sentences.english: Increasingly, I find God uses our wounds in his service.
sentences.chinese: 我越来越发现，上帝使用我们的伤痕来做工。

sentences.english: Home to a strong earthquake, the people working outside Xinjirufen.
sentences.chinese: 家乡遭受强烈地震，在外做工的人心里急躁如焚。

sentences.english: The oven was made of a roughly built cube of fire-bricks.
sentences.chinese: 烤箱是用做工粗糙的近似立方形的耐火砖做的。

sentences.english: Designer clothes, after all, are simply made well.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟，设计师的衣服确实做工考究。

sentences.english: I think you will find the new packing beautiful and quite well-done.
sentences.chinese: 我想你会发现新包装很漂亮，而且做工也很不错。

sentences.english: Since you are so kind, buy you to Wal fu as a workman.
sentences.chinese: 念你一片孝心，就买就到华府做工。

sentences.english: Wang Mian working and studying on the same time .
sentences.chinese: 王冕一边做工，一边学习。

sentences.english: And I'm sure our well-made teddy bears will meet your satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 我相信我们的做工精良的玩具熊会使你们满意的。

sentences.english: The workmanship of this furniture is very poor.
A:I want a suit of workmanship and suitable for formal meetings.
sentences.chinese: 我想要一套做工好，适合参加正式会议的西装。

sentences.english: The well-made costume is prepared for the opera to be shown.
sentences.chinese: 这件做工考究的戏装是为即将上演的歌剧准备的。

sentences.english: Very simple but elegant lovely prints, texture and handiwork is top-notch.
sentences.chinese: 非常素雅可爱的印花图案，质地和做工都是一流。

sentences.english: This tea, have mandalas technique work precision bouquet, born of tea.
sentences.chinese: 此茶做工手法精密，有曼陀罗花香味，生茶。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
quality control (QC), abbr. for 品質控制|品质控制
